user_story.i_want: make an application to withdraw some shares
user_story.so_that: reduce my investment in the co-op

givens_list: I hold more shares than the minimum shareholding
whens_list: I go to the Shares page
I choose to withdraw a number of shares which will still leave me with the minimum shareholding
thens_list: I should see that my withdrawal application has been received
the Secretary should receive a notification of the share withdrawal application

givens_list: I hold only the minimum shareholding
whens_list: I go to the Shares page
I choose to withdraw all my shares
I confirm that I want to terminate my membership
thens_list: I should see a notice that this withdrawal will terminate my membership
I should see that my withdrawal application has been received
the Secretary should receive a notification of the share withdrawal application
